roleset.name: cause to lose value
roleset.note: CHEAPEN-V NOTES: Oddly, cheapen doesn't seem to mean"reduce in price", which wouldalso be a class 45.4 verb but with different PAS (requiring an EXT,start and end points). (from cheapen.01-v)

example.name: just transitive
example.text: But ``on a new car, a rebate doesn't work well'' because it cheapens the vehicle's image, contends Thomas D. Mignanelli, executive vice president of Nissan's U.S. sales arm.

example.name: with instrument
example.text: John cheapens his own image by associating with characters like Mary. (Oh, that's harsh.)
example.arg: by associating with characters like Mary

roleset.name: inexpensive, lacking in quality
roleset.note: CHEAP-J NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire. Based on verb frame, cheapen.01, but is only grammatical with arg1: thing that is cheap, cheapened, and the adjective can talk about prices of things being cheap, so this has an added arg3 for price itself. (from cheap.01-j)
CHEAPER-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from cheaper.01-j)

example.name: Args 1 & 3
example.text: 99 p is way too cheap for that.

example.name: With it EXP
example.text: It was cheap for me to fly from Kampala to London.
example.arg: for me to fly from Kampala to London.
